typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		{Attribute 1 Name} as string,
		{Product Hierarchy Code} as string,
		Area as string,
		{Time Name} as string,
		{Volume Sales (MSU)} as double,
		{Category Volume Share} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Country as string,
		Attribute_1_Name as string,
		Product_Hierarchy_Code as string,
		Area as string,
		Time_Name as string,
		Volume_Sales_MSU as integer,
		Category_Volume_Share as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	mapColumn(
		Country,
		Attribute_1_Name = {Attribute 1 Name},
		Product_Hierarchy_Code = {Product Hierarchy Code},
		Area,
		Time_Name = {Time Name},
		Volume_Sales_MSU = {Volume Sales (MSU)},
		Category_Volume_Share = {Category Volume Share}
	)) ~> sink1
